column2: we decided to order edamame and crispy calamari. The edamame came out first and just like every other restaurant
column3: it tasted the same here and left me nothing to complain about. The calamari
column5: was definitely something I could rave about. It was perfectly cooked
column6: with the right amount of crunchiness and the sauces it came with made it all the more better. Too bad the same can't be said for the two sushi rolls we ordered...
